CustomField.formula: MIN(6, (CASE(DMAPP__Status__c, "Mentor", 2, "Enemy", 2, "Supporter", 1, "Non-Supporter", 1, "Neutral", 0, "Unknown", 0, 0)) + (CASE(DMAPP__Political__c, "Inner Circle", 2, "Political Structure", 1, "Unknown", 0, "Outside Political Structure", 0, 0)) + (CASE(DMAPP__Key_Buyer_Role__c, "decision maker", 2, "approver", 2, "evaluator", 1, "user", 0, "other", 0, 0)) )
CustomField.label: Squares
